Dear Ms. Matthews:
Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above
referenced facility.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact the local office at (734) 665-4740.
Sincerely,
Pinkey Brown, Licensing Consultant

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
OFFICE OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB820201055
Licensee Name: CHILDRENS CENTER WAYNE CO
Licensee Address: 79 W Alexandrine
Detroit, MI 48201
Licensee Telephone #:
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Theodore Lewis Jr., Administrator
Name of Facility: Children's Center Wayne Co
Facility Address: 79 W Alexandrine
Detroit, MI 48202
Facility Telephone #: (313) 831-5520
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The facility has requested that Supervised Independent Living placement be added
to their license.
III. Methodology
9/20/06 – Written policy and procedures hand delivered during onsite for
Independent Living Program.
9/26/06 – Telephone contact regarding policy and procedures. Procedures not
acceptable.
10/4/06 – Written policy and procedures hand delivered to the Bloomfield Hills office.
10/5/06 – Telephone contact. Policy and Procedures accepted.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The facility is currently authorize to certify foster homes, receive children for
placement in license foster homes, evaluate applicants for adoption and place and
supervise children with adoptive parents.
The Supervised Independent Living Program office will be located at 79 W.
Alexandrine, Detroit, Michigan 48202.
V. Recommendation
It is recommended that Supervised Independent Living Program be added to the
current license. License # CB820201055.
_ ___________11/2/2006
Pinkey Brown Date
Licensing Consultant
2
